subject: Hockey, Ice
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: Seeking to break a stalemate in their labor talks on the 72nd day of a lockout, the N.H.L. and the players’ association agreed to accept mediation.
snippet: Seeking to break a stalemate in their labor talks on the 72nd day of a lockout, the N.H.L. and the players’ association agreed to accept mediation.
